meanings.definition: A large, amphibious rodent known for building dams and lodges.
meanings.sent1: The beaver worked hard to construct a sturdy dam.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beaver swimming gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent3: Why did the beaver bring a suitcase to the dam? To pack his belongings!
meanings.sent4: Her work ethic is like that of a beaver, always busy and productive.
meanings.sent5: The beaver's lodge was a cozy home in the midst of the forest.

meanings.definition: A hat made from beaver fur.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa wore his favorite beaver hat to the winter festival.
meanings.sent2: The beaver hat kept her head warm in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: Why did the beaver hat refuse to talk? It was too fur-ocious!
meanings.sent4: She felt like a queen in her luxurious beaver hat.
meanings.sent5: The beaver hat was a stylish accessory for the elegant gentleman.

meanings.definition: A heavy woolen cloth used for overcoats.
meanings.sent1: The tailor used beaver fabric to create a warm overcoat.
meanings.sent2: His beaver overcoat protected him from the chilly wind.
meanings.sent3: Why did the beaver fabric blush? It saw a coat made from its own material!
meanings.sent4: The beaver cloth felt like a shield against the cold.
meanings.sent5: The beaver overcoat was as comforting as a hug on a frosty day.
